entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Ottawa (Kanata - Orléans)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:32 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 0.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ottawa Macdonald-Cartier Int'l Airport 12:00 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 0.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 71 %
Dewpoint: -3.9°C
Wind: NW 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly cloudy. Temperature falling to minus 3 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 3 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 6 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Snow mixed with ice pellets beginning this evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h late this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 16. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
